name: Flier Miner
description:
Use your mouse to move left and right. Click or press space to shoot downward, propelling yourself up in the process.

Avoid red hazards.

Collect yellow score points.

Heal yourself by collecting blue health packs.

Score additional points by mining the brown rocks!

Made in less than two days by @onygox for Ludum Dare 48 with the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

Spaceship model is from Quaternius.
